email.description: The email address of the user.

expiresAt.description: The timestamp when the message expires.

messageContext.saveToInbox.description: Indicates if the message should be saved to the inbox.

templateId.description: The unique identifier of the template used in the in-app click event.

messageId.description: The unique identifier of the message.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the in-app click event occurred.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user.

clickedUrl.description: The URL clicked by the user.

saveToInbox.description: Indicates if the message should be saved to the inbox.

silentInbox.description: Indicates if the message should be sent silently to the inbox.

location.description: The location where the message was clicked.

deviceInfo.description: Information about the device used for the in-app click event.

appPackageName.description: The package name of the app.

messageContext.silentInbox.description: Indicates if the message should be sent silently to the inbox.

deviceInfo.appPackageName.description: The package name of the app.

messageContext.location.description: The location where the message was clicked.

sentAt.description: The timestamp when the in-app notification was sent.

campaignId.description: The unique identifier of the campaign associated with the in-app click event.
